name: Trafalgar Law
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Activate:Main] [Once Per Turn] Select 2 of your {Supernovas} or {Heart Pirates} type Characters. Swap the base power of the selected Characters with each other during this turn.

name: Trafalgar Law (Alternate Art)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Activate:Main] [Once Per Turn] Select 2 of your {Supernovas} or {Heart Pirates} type Characters. Swap the base power of the selected Characters with each other during this turn.

name: Monkey.D.Luffy
effect:
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type card other than [Monkey.D.Luffy] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -1000 power during this turn.

name: Monkey.D.Luffy (Alternate Art)
effect:
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type card other than [Monkey.D.Luffy] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -1000 power during this turn.

name: Dracule Mihawk
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
If your opponent's Leader has the "Slash" attribute, this leader gains +1000 power.
[Activate:Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your cards: If there is a Character with a cost of 5 or more, set up to 3 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, you cannot play character cards during this turn.

name: Dracule Mihawk (Alternate Art)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
If your opponent's Leader has the "Slash" attribute, this leader gains +1000 power.
[Activate:Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your cards: If there is a Character with a cost of 5 or more, set up to 3 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, you cannot play character cards during this turn.

name: Perona
effect:
[On Play] Up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.
[On K.O.] You may rest 1 of your cards: Play up to 1 green Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.

name: Perona (Alternate Art)
effect:
[On Play] Up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.
[On K.O.] You may rest 1 of your cards: Play up to 1 green Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.

name: Donquixhote Doflamingo
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] DON!! -1: Select your Leader or 1 of your {Donquixote Pirates} type Characters. Change the attack target to the selected card.

name: Donquixhote Doflamingo (Alternate Art)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] DON!! -1: Select your Leader or 1 of your {Donquixote Pirates} type Characters. Change the attack target to the selected card.

name: Sugar
effect:
[On Play] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
[On K.O.] If your opponent has 6 or more DON!! cards on their field, play up to 1 {Donquixote Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.

name: Megalo (Alternate Art)
effect: [On Play] You may rest this Character: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with 8000 power or less.

name: Jinbe
effect:
[Blocker]
[On K.O.] You may rest 1 of your cards: If your Leader has the {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type, play up to 1 green Character card with a cost of 6 or less from your hand.

name: Eleclaw
effect:
[Main] You may rest 1 of your cards: If your Leader has the {Minks} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -3 cost during this turn.
[Counter] Up to 1 of your {Minks} type Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle.

name: Issho (Alternate Art)
effect:
[On Play] You may trash 2 cards from your hand: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in their hand, your opponent places 2 cards from their hand at the bottom of their deck in any order.
[DON!!Ã—1] [When Attacking] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters-2000 power during this turn.

name: Kaido
effect:
If this Character would be K.O.'d, you may return 1 DON!! card from your field to your DON!! deck instead.
[On Play] DON!! -2: If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type, this Character gains Rush during this turn. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less.

name: King (Alternate Art)
effect:
If this Character would be K.O.'d, you may return 1 DON!! card from your field to your DON!! deck instead.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type and you have no other [King] Characters, add up to 1 DON!! card from your, DON!! deck and set it as active, and add up to 1 additional DON!! card and rest it.

name: Gecko Moria
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may K.O. 1 of your {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Characters: Your Leader and all of your Characters gain +1000 power during this turn.
[When Attacking] You may trash 3 cards from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

name: Gecko Moria (Alternate Art)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may K.O. 1 of your {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Characters: Your Leader and all of your Characters gain +1000 power during this turn.
[When Attacking] You may trash 3 cards from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.

name: Gecko Moria
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[On Play] Select up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character with a cost of 4 or less from your trash and play it or add it to the top of your Life cards face-up.
[Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your trash.

name: Gecko Moria (Alternate Art)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[On Play] Select up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character with a cost of 4 or less from your trash and play it or add it to the top of your Life cards face-up.
[Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your trash.

name: Crocodile
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
All of your opponent's Characters cannot be removed from the field by your effects.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may K.O. 1 of your Characters with a type including "Baroque Works": Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -10 cost during this turn. Then, you may trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

name: Crocodile (Alternate Art)
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
All of your opponent's Characters cannot be removed from the field by your effects.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may K.O. 1 of your Characters with a type including "Baroque Works": Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -10 cost during this turn. Then, you may trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

name: Ms. All Sunday
effect: [On Play] If your Leader's type includes "Baroque Works", play up to 1 Character card with a type including "Baroque Works" and a cost of 4 or less and up to 1 Character card with a type including "Baroque Works" and a cost of 1 from your trash.

name: Ms. All Sunday (Alternate Art)
effect: [On Play] If your Leader's type includes "Baroque Works", play up to 1 Character card with a type including "Baroque Works" and a cost of 4 or less and up to 1 Character card with a type including "Baroque Works" and a cost of 1 from your trash.

name: Boa Hancock
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[Opponent's Turn] When you play a Character, draw 1 card.
[DON!!x1] [Once Per Turn] When one of your {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type Characters with 5000 base power or more is K.O.'d add up to 1 card from the top of your opponent's Life cards to the owner's hand.

subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:

[DON!!x1] [Once Per Turn] When one of your {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type Characters with 5000 base power or more is K.O.'d add up to 1 card from the top of your opponent's Life cards to the owner's hand.

name: Boa Hancock
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:

[Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and a [Trigger] from your hand.

subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:

[Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and a [Trigger] from your hand.

name: Stealth Black
effect:
[Main] If your Leader is [Sanji] and you have 4 or more DON!! cards on your field, play up to 1 [Sanji] with 6000 power or less from your hand or trash.
[Trigger] Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

name: Boa Hancock
subtypes: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect:
[On Play] Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.
[Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with 5000 power or less and a [Trigger] from your hand.

name: Chaka & Pell
effect:
[Double Attack] (This card deals 2 damage.)
[On Play] You may give your active Leader -5000 power during this turn: Draw 2 cards.

effect: [Activate: Main] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Leader or Character cards.
